## Problem 1

### a. Read data

```{r}
install.packages("haven")
library(haven)

data <- read_xpt("AUX_I.xpt")
data2 <- read_xpt("DEMO_I.xpt")

#Merge using (dplyr)

install.packages("dplyr")
library(dplyr)

merged_data <- inner_join(data, data2, by = "SEQN")
dim(merged_data)
head(merged_data)
```
